name: EEP 13
summary:
Create your own railway worlds with Germany's No. 1 train simulation
With EEP you can bring even your biggest railway dreams to life. EEP 13 is the most comprehensive train simulation yet and the leading design and operation tool on the market. Discover the possibilities of a professional railway simulation which answers all your desires.
You may choose to either go on a discovery tour with any of the six included ready-to-use layouts. Or begin to build your very own railway world in every detail. Form mountains, valleys and river beds of any size. Populate it with a huge variety of buildings. Create rail and road networks of any complexity.
